planet.name: KOI-370 2
KOI-370 c
planet.description: This planet was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. The planet is part of a multiplanetary system. It's planetary nature has been confirmed using transit timing variations which arise because the planets in one system pull on each other and slightly alter the transit times.
